        Constant Field Values

      • showLegacyMode

        public boolean showLegacyMode
        Show checkbox to enable legacy mode. A few older Imp cards need this mode to BlinkUp the first time. Once they're online (indicated by a green light) they'll be automatically updated to the latest version of the imp OS and won't need Legacy BlinkUp Mode again.

      • showPassword

        public boolean showPassword
        Show checkbox to show password.

      • drawableIdInterstitial

        public int drawableIdInterstitial
        Resource Id for the image to activate the interstitial page.

      • countdownSeconds

        public int countdownSeconds
        Number of seconds to count down before BlinkUp. Default is 3.

      • enablePowerSaveMessage

        public boolean enablePowerSaveMessage
        Show warning message before BlinkUp on detecting a low frame rate. Default is true.

      • setFullScreenBrightness

        public boolean setFullScreenBrightness
        Set screen brightness to 100%. Default is true.

      • setScreenBrightnessPercent

        public int setScreenBrightnessPercent
        Set screen brightness to this percentage. Default is 100. This overrides setFullScreenBrightness i.e. if this is set to anything other than 100, the screen brightness will be set to this percentage whether setFullScreenBrightness is set to true or false.

      • smallBlinkupWindow

        public boolean smallBlinkupWindow
        BlinkUp in small window instead of full screen. Default is false.

      • showClearConfig

        public boolean showClearConfig
        Show clear device settings in the wifi select interface. Default is true.

      • intentBlinkupComplete

        public Intent intentBlinkupComplete
        Intent to launch your activity after flashing the wifi settings via BlinkUp. You need to set this and call handleActivityResult from the onActivityResult of your activity.

      • intentClearComplete

        public Intent intentClearComplete
        Intent to launch your activity after clearing the wifi settings via BlinkUp. You need to set this and call handleActivityResult from the onActivityResult of your activity.

      • lastMode

        protected String lastMode

      • handleActivityResult

        public void handleActivityResult(Activity activity,
                                 int requestCode,
                                 int resultCode,
                                 Intent data)
        Call this from onActivityResult of your activity if you have specified a custom complete activity via intentBlinkupComplete or intentClearComplete
        Parameters:
        activity - Your activity
        requestCode - Request code from onActivityResult
        resultCode - Result code from onActivityResult
        data - Intent from onActivityResult

                       String[] pins)

      • setPlanID

        public void setPlanID(String planID)
        Set planID for all requests. Most developers won't need to reuse existing planIDs. Please contact support if you have questions.

      • clearSavedData

        public void clearSavedData(Context context)
        Clear cached and persistent data (saved passwords, most recent blinkup, etc)
        Parameters:
        context - Context to clear data

        Parameters:

        apiKey - Your api key
        tokenAcquireCallback - Callback for success and error

      • getTokenStatus

        public void getTokenStatus(TokenStatusCallback callback)
        Fetch the agent url, impee ID and verified date after BlinkUp.
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback to handle success, error and timeout.

      • getTokenStatus

        public void getTokenStatus(String token,
                           TokenStatusCallback callback)
        Fetch the agent url, impee ID and verified date after BlinkUp.
        Parameters:
        token - The setup token
        callback - Callback to handle success, error and timeout.

      • getTokenStatus

        public void getTokenStatus(TokenStatusCallback callback,
                           long timeoutMs)
        Fetch the agent url, impee ID and verified date after BlinkUp.
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback to handle success, error and timeout.
        timeoutMs - timeout in milliseconds.

      • getTokenStatus

        public void getTokenStatus(String token,
                           TokenStatusCallback callback,
                           long timeoutMs)
        Fetch the agent url, impee ID and verified date after BlinkUp.
        Parameters:
        token - The setup token
        callback - Callback to handle success, error and timeout.
        timeoutMs - timeout in milliseconds.

      • cancelTokenStatusPolling

        public void cancelTokenStatusPolling()
        Stop the current token status fetching. This will stop the SDK from polling and prevent any more TokenStatusCallbacks from being sent. Typically done after the end user has blinked up and is waiting for token status and the end user hits some kind of cancel or back button.
